text: Richard Low Drury (May 2, 1863 – September 4, 1915) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of British Columbia from 1903 to 1907 from the electoral district of Victoria City, as a Liberal. Drury died in 1915 from the effects of diabetes.https://archive.org/stream/dailycolonist57y231uvic#page/n0/mode/1up/search/drury ==References== Category:1863 births Category:1915 deaths Category:British Columbia Liberal Party MLAs
title: Richard Low Drury
